gardenmod:WateringCan.NAME: Watering Can
gardenmod:WateringCan.DESCRIPTION: gardenmod:Water 1 Plant and all adjacent Plants.

gardenmod:WateringSlam.NAME: Watering Slam
gardenmod:WateringSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL gardenmod:Water 1 Plant twice.

gardenmod:Whackale.NAME: Whackale
gardenmod:Whackale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plant 1 gardenmod:Whackale and gardenmod:Water it.

gardenmod:GloveSmacks.NAME: Glove Smacks
gardenmod:GloveSmacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each *Mature Plant, deal !gardensecond! damage.

gardenmod:PerfectMoment.NAME: Perfect Moment
gardenmod:PerfectMoment.DESCRIPTION: If you have no *Mature Plants, gain !B! Block.

gardenmod:HasItsThorn.NAME: Has Its Thorn
gardenmod:HasItsThorn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Plant !M! gardenmod:Roses. NL Exhaust.

gardenmod:ByAnyOtherName.NAME: By Any Other Name
gardenmod:ByAnyOtherName.DESCRIPTION: All gardenmod:Roses turn into random other Plants. NL Exhaust.

gardenmod:SteadyImprovements.NAME: Steady Improvements
gardenmod:SteadyImprovements.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

gardenmod:SickleStrike.NAME: Sickle Strike
gardenmod:SickleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least !M! Plants in a column, apply 2 Weak.

gardenmod:StuntGrowth.NAME: Stunt Growth
gardenmod:StuntGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Reset the growth of 1 Plant.

gardenmod:SeedBomber.NAME: Seed Bomber
gardenmod:SeedBomber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ï€Transform a random card in your hand into a copy of this.

gardenmod:ExploitLand.NAME: Exploit Land
gardenmod:ExploitLand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL A random empty Plot becomes gardenmod:Scorched_Earth.

gardenmod:ShroomBoom.NAME: Shroom Boom
gardenmod:ShroomBoom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gardenmod:Harvest a gardenmod:Shroom, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

gardenmod:Popcorn.NAME: Popcorn
gardenmod:Popcorn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Plant !M! gardenmod:Corn.

gardenmod:TakeYourTime.NAME: Retire
gardenmod:TakeYourTime.DESCRIPTION: Opener. NL Take an extra turn after this one. NL End your turn.

gardenmod:RootRout.NAME: Root Rout
gardenmod:RootRout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plant 1 gardenmod:Bruteroot in a random Plot.

gardenmod:BackIntoIt.NAME: Yer Back Into It
gardenmod:BackIntoIt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL gardenmod:Water a random Plant. NL Lose 5 HP.
gardenmod:BackIntoIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL gardenmod:Water 2 random Plants. NL Lose 5 HP.
